values.name: IndependentChannels
values.description-en: Channel n and channel n + 1 are independent.

values.name: ConnectedChannels
values.description-en: Channel n and channel n + 1 are connected.

enums.name: NI.FIU.Fault
enums.description-en: Selects which fault is inserted to the channel.

values.name: FaultA
values.description-en: Fault A is inserted to the channel.

values.name: FaultB
values.description-en: Fault B is inserted to the channel.

enums.name: NI.FIU.Load
enums.description-en: Determines if channel n is connected to load pin n.

values.name: NoLoad
values.description-en: The Load pin is not connected to channel n.

values.name: Load
values.description-en: The load pin is connected to channel n.

enums.name: NI.FIU.UpdateModeEnum
enums.description-en: Determines how the channel state is updated.

values.name: UpdateCommand
values.description-en: Channels are updated when an Update command is issued by software.

values.name: Trigger
values.description-en: Channels are updated upon a trigger edge.

interrupts.name: UpdateComplete
interrupts.description-en: Signals completion of the most recent Update operation

bitfields.name: UpdateDone
bitfields.description-en: Begin updating all channels that have UpdateSource set to Software. You can use the UpdateComplete interrupt and/or UpdateCompleteStatus bit to determine when the update is complete. Only one Update operation can execute at a time.

bitfields.name: UpdateDoneMask
bitfields.description-en: Begin updating all channels that have UpdateSource set to Software. You can use the UpdateComplete interrupt and/or UpdateCompleteStatus bit to determine when the update is complete. Only one Update operation can execute at a time.

bitfields.name: UpdateDoneEnable
bitfields.description-en: Begin updating all channels that have UpdateSource set to Software. You can use the UpdateComplete interrupt and/or UpdateCompleteStatus bit to determine when the update is complete. Only one Update operation can execute at a time.

bitfields.name: UpdateDoneDisable
bitfields.description-en: Begin updating all channels that have UpdateSource set to Software. You can use the UpdateComplete interrupt and/or UpdateCompleteStatus bit to determine when the update is complete. Only one Update operation can execute at a time.

bitfields.name: UpdateDoneAck
bitfields.description-en: Begin updating all channels that have UpdateSource set to Software. You can use the UpdateComplete interrupt and/or UpdateCompleteStatus bit to determine when the update is complete. Only one Update operation can execute at a time.

bitfields.name: CycleDelays
bitfields.description-en: Number of 12.8 us cycles of delay to achieve around 2ms delay

bitfields.name: FastCount
bitfields.description-en: Number of 12.8 us cycles of delay to achieve around 2ms delay

bitfields.name: SlowCount
bitfields.description-en: Number of 12.8 us cycles of delay to achieve around 2ms delay

bitfields.description-en: Enables the load on channel

bitfields.name: FaultSelectionP
bitfields.description-en: Fault connected to channel n. (0: No Fault; 1: A; 2: B)

bitfields.name: TempSensorEnable
bitfields.description-en: Selects the update mode for the module.

bitfields.name: BoardEnable
bitfields.description-en: Selects the update mode for the module.

bitfields.name: UpdateModeField
bitfields.description-en: Selects the update mode for the module.

bitfields.name: Update
bitfields.description-en: Writing a 1 to this register updates all the channels.

bitfields.name: FaultAOvercurrent
bitfields.description-en: If '1', it means overcurrent was detected in the corresponding fault bus.

bitfields.name: FaultBOvercurrent
bitfields.description-en: If '1', it means overcurrent was detected in the corresponding fault bus.

bitfields.name: OvercurrentHigh
bitfields.description-en: If '1', it means overcurrent was detected in the corresponding fault bus.

bitfields.name: OvercurrentLow
bitfields.description-en: If '1', it means overcurrent was detected in the corresponding fault bus.

bitfields.name: OvertemperatureChannel
bitfields.description-en: If '1', it means overcurrent was detected in the corresponding fault bus.

bitfields.name: OvertemperatureDifferential
bitfields.description-en: If '1', it means overcurrent was detected in the corresponding fault bus.

bitfields.name: TempFaultVector
bitfields.description-en: Raw Value of the temperture threhold

bitfields.name: OverCurrentHigh
bitfields.description-en: Number of 12.8 us cycles of delay to achieve around 2ms delay

bitfields.name: OverCurrentLow
bitfields.description-en: Number of 12.8 us cycles of delay to achieve around 2ms delay

bitfields.name: OverCurrentFaultBus
bitfields.description-en: Number of 12.8 us cycles of delay to achieve around 2ms delay

bitfields.name: OverTemperature
bitfields.description-en: Number of 12.8 us cycles of delay to achieve around 2ms delay

bitfields.name: SlscInterfaceUnusedPin
bitfields.description-en: State of the unused SLSC Pin

bitfields.name: ClearWriteDuringUpdateError
bitfields.description-en: Write 1 to this bit to allow the module change the configuraiton. Alternatively you can reset the module.

bitfields.name: FlashHold
bitfields.description-en: Unused, this bit is ignored.

bitfields.name: FlashWriteProtect
bitfields.description-en: 0: Flash protected against write. 1: Flash available for write.

bitfields.name: AcquiredTemperature
bitfields.description-en: Raw value of the temperature

bitfields.name: AcquiredTemperature
bitfields.description-en: Raw value of the temperature

bitfields.name: AcquiredTemperature
bitfields.description-en: Raw value of the temperature

bitfields.name: AcquiredTemperature
bitfields.description-en: Raw value of the temperature

bitfields.name: TempThrehold
bitfields.description-en: Raw Value of the temperture threhold

bitfields.name: Timestamp
bitfields.description-en: Version of the Module Controller.

properties.name: NI.FIU.ModuleControllerVersion
properties.description-en: Module Controller Version.
properties.documentation-en: The version is the timestamp, in hexadecimal format, of the time the Module Controller was compiled.

properties.name: NI.FIU.UpdateMode
properties.description-en: Defines the update mode for the channels.

properties.name: NI.FIU.WriteDuringUpdateError
properties.description-en: If a write to a fault channel is executed while an update is in progress this bit will be asserted and no channels can be changed until the error is cleared using ClearWriteDuringUpdateError or the module is reset. (Recommended)

properties.name: NI.FIU.ClearWriteDuringUpdateError
properties.description-en: Clears the WriteDuringUpdateError

properties.name: NI.FIU.TemperatureSensor0
properties.description-en: Reading of the temperature sensor.

properties.name: NI.FIU.TemperatureSensor1
properties.description-en: Reading of the temperature sensor.

properties.name: NI.FIU.TemperatureSensor2
properties.description-en: Reading of the temperature sensor.

properties.name: NI.FIU.TemperatureSensor3
properties.description-en: Reading of the temperature sensor.

properties.name: NI.FIU.DigitalTemperatureFaults
properties.description-en: Reading of the temperature sensor.

commands.name: NI.FIU.FaultUpdate
commands.documentation-en: Update channel configuration using the update command.
